When Sin Cultist enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Cleric. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Sewer Nibbler
cards.text:
When Sewer Nibbler enters the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Rat. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Grim Mercenary
cards.text:
Desperation (This creature may despair as it attacks. If it does, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
When Grim Mercenary despairs, it gains double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Priest of Velka
cards.text:
When Priest of Velka enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Zombies you control and you gain that much life.
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Cleric. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Havel, the Rock
cards.text:
Havel, the Rock gets +1/+1 for each nontoken Equipment you control.
You may pay 0 rather than pay equip costs.

cards.name: Hungering Knight
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Hungering Knight gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Dour Vagrant
cards.text:
When Dour Vagrant enters the battlefield, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Rogue. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Seeker of the Cure
cards.text: Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Knight. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Barbaric Cleric
cards.text:
When Barbaric Cleric enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Cleric. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Astora Outcast
cards.text:
Whenever Astora Outcast attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Knight. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Deathless Commander
cards.text: Other Zombies and Knights you control get +1/+1.

cards.name: Stalking Phantom
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Whenever you put a journeyed card into your hand, put a +1/+1 counter on Stalking Phantom.

cards.name: Path of Brilliance
cards.text:
When Path of Brilliance enters the battlefield, journey twice. (To journey, exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you own a journeyed card in exile, tap target creature an opponent controls.

cards.name: Sunlight Spear
cards.text: Sunlight Spear deals 6 damage to any target. This damage can’t be prevented.

cards.name: Ancient Extinction
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all creatures with flying.
• Destroy all lands with activated abilities that aren’t mana abilities.

cards.name: Hopeless Determination
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, skip that draw instead.

cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, lifelink
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Angel. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Undead Steed
cards.text: When Undead Steed enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token.

cards.name: Jolly Cooperation
cards.text:
Untap up to two target creatures. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
Journey twice. (To journey, exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.name: Exiled Priestess

Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Cleric. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Everlasting Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you or to Everlasting Dragon.

cards.name: Heavy Iron Armor
cards.text:
If a source would deal damage to equipped creature, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

cards.name: Power Within
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Power Within deals damage to you equal to that spell’s converted mana cost.

cards.name: Flooding of New Londo
cards.text: Return all creatures to their owners’ hands. For each creature returned to its owner’s hand this way, its controller puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

cards.name: Sen's Fortress Golem
cards.text:
Vigilance
Creatures can’t attack you or a permanent you control unless their controller pays 3 for each of those creatures.

cards.name: Sunlight Paragon
cards.text:
Flying
Creatures can’t attack alone.

Flash
Flying

cards.text:
Trample
When Manus, Father of the Abyss enters the battlefield, it fights target creature an opponent controls.
If a nontoken creature an opponent controls would die, instead exile it and you draw a card.

cards.name: Doomed Pilgrim
cards.text:
When Doomed Pilgrim enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to two Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Cleric. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Vinheim Handler
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.name: Izalith Firesage
cards.text:
Trample
When Izalith Firesage enters the battlefield, scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. When you do, Izalith Firesage deals X damage to any target, where X is the revealed card’s converted mana cost.

cards.name: Cruel Lunatic
cards.text:
When Cruel Lunatic enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 5 damage to them. If a player does, sacrifice Cruel Lunatic.
Hollow (Discard a card, Pay this card’s mana cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a black Zombie Human Berserker. Hollow only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Expendable's Vigil
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has vigilance.
Whenever a Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay W. If you do, return Expendable’s Vigil from your graveyard to your hand.

Defender

cards.name: Fallen Farmer
cards.text: 1B: Return Fallen Farmer from your graveyard to your hand.

Enchant creature

Desperation (This creature may despair as it attacks. If it does, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
When Deluded Thrasher despairs, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

Flying

Desperation (This creature may despair as it attacks. If it does, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

Create a 4/4 colorless Dragon artifact creature token with flying.

cards.text: Journey five times. At the beginning of the next end step, shuffle five journeyed cards you own in exile into your library. (To journey, exile the top card of your library face up.
